pull.title: .gitignore: Don't ignore depends patches
pull.body: Ignoring patches might be useful for those who use `git format-patch` often, but in our depends folder we **_want_** to keep track of our patches.

events.body:
I guess this is just some issue with GitHubs UI, as this was only merged ~13 minutes ago.

![gh](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/57375760-d60fb280-71d0-11e9-99b2-33af152c43f7.png)

issue.title: depends|build: Make sure configuration detects Qt built with DEBUG=1
issue.body:
Backporting some stuff ahead of time to fix Qt config if built with `DEBUG=1` which seems to be broken (at least for me here) since we upgraded to Qt 5.9.6. Note that bitcoin#18298 isn't merged yet to upstream but it seems to work fine. 

Tested on macOS 10.15.6, no idea what Windows thinks about this but at least CI still passes.
